metadata.title: CVE-2019-3569 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: HHVM, when used with FastCGI, would bind by default to all availableinterfaces. This behavior could allow a malicious individual unintendeddirect access to the application, which could result in informationdisclosure. This issue affects versions 4.3.0, 4.4.0, 4.5.0, 4.6.0, 4.7.0,4.8.0, versions 3.30.5 and below, and all versions in the 4.0, 4.1, and 4.2series.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
